text: Assay samples contained 10 ml of a 100 mM HEPES-NaOH buffer solution pH 7.5/1 mM EDTA, 10 ml enzyme solution (2 mM CVB3 3C Pro ), 10 ml of 10 mM substrate solution (both dissolved in the above buffer) and 1 ml Inhibitor and/or fragment dissolved in DMSO. For assay results of a dilution series of a mixture of 1 and 2 and comparison of reaction products in dependence of the assay solvent, see Supplementary Figs 1 and 2 .
